job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: pWe are looking for an experienced Senior Software Engineer who is passionate and has cybersecurity experience The incumbent will be responsible for writing and coding individual programs presenting to clients and more ppbrppDuties and ResponsibilitiespulliInterpret business requirements and technical specificationsliliDesign APIs to encompass service functionalityliliPerform coding to technical specificationsliliInvestigate analyze and document reported defectsliliPerform maintenance programming and correction of identified defectsliliCreate and document and implement unit test plans scripts and test harnessesliliCreate and maintain technical documentation using defined technical documentation templatesliliParticipate in brainstorm sessions with the teamliliColead presentations demo our software and answer client questionsliliPerforms related duties as assignedliulpbrppSkills  Attributes RequiredpulliMinimum of 5 years experienceliliSubstantial experience in CC and CliliMultithreading concurrent programming abilitiesliliSystemlevel applicationservices programming experienceliliKnowledge of database architecture and designliliStrong objectoriented programming skills and design patternsliliInternationalization experience is a plusliliGood communication skills team player and cooperativeliliAbility to interpret requirements and technical specificationsliliAbility to code software according to published standards and design guidelinesliliFlexible attitude ability to perform under pressureliliA commitment to quality and a thorough approach to the workliliAbility to work well within a teamliliAbility to work with minimal supervisionliul
